abilities.description: When you are cloaked and make a move against a specific foe or threat to avoid detection, you may preset your action die to the Predator's integrity. If utilizing cover, make it one more (up to six).
When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.2f2ba4090b22a122]{Enter the Fray} while cloaked, add +1 and mark progress on a strong hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} while cloaked, you may roll +shadow. If you do, choose one (before rolling):

  • Strike true: Reroll any dice.
  • Strike hard: Mark progress on a hit.
On a strong hit with a match, you also remain totally undetected; take +2 momentum and add +1 if your next move is a @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike}.
